structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 44, sec. 1, effective June 8, 2011.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/8/2011).The order of subsections (3) and (4) in 2011 Ky. Acts. ch.44, sec.1, has been reversed so that definitions in this section are now in alphabetical order. The Reviser of Statutes has rearranged these subsections under the authority of KRS 7.136.
